name: FSplineMeshParams
doc:
Structure that holds info about spline, passed to renderer to deform UStaticMesh.
Also used by Lightmass, so be sure to update Lightmass::FSplineMeshParams and the static lighting code if this changes!

StartPos: Start location of spline, in component space.
StartTangent: Start tangent of spline, in component space.
StartScale: X and Y scale applied to mesh at start of spline.
StartRoll: Roll around spline applied at start, in radians.
StartOffset: Starting offset of the mesh from the spline, in component space.
EndPos: End location of spline, in component space.
EndScale: X and Y scale applied to mesh at end of spline.
EndTangent: End tangent of spline, in component space.
EndRoll: Roll around spline applied at end, in radians.
EndOffset: Ending offset of the mesh from the spline, in component space.
NaniteClusterBoundsScale:
How much to scale the calculated culling bounds of Nanite clusters after deformation.
NOTE: This should only be set greater than 1.0 if it fixes visible issues with clusters being
incorrectly culled.
